concept.title: 5342.490-1 Contract clause

conbody.p: The contracting officer shall insert the clause substantially the same as the clause at AFFARS 5352.242-9000 in solicitations and contracts that require contractor personnel to make frequent visits to or perform work on Air Force installation(s).
